title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for May 12
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for May 12
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Carl Riccadonna Chief U.S. Economist Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing the economy and markets with Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson, who also discusses his Chart of the Day "Snap's drop after first post-IPO results brings deja vu."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
